parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: TaskTypes
parameters.description:
The task types. Valid values:

*   CHECK_ALL: full check.
*   CHECK_POLICY: policy-based check for which check items are configured.
*   CHECK_SCHEDULE: scheduled check.
*   CHECK_ITEM: specific check item-based check.
*   CHECK_INSTANCE: specific check item-based check on specific instances.
